snippet: Mitt Romney’s biggest challenge at the moment is not President Obama. It’s himself. He begins a four-state bus tour on Saturday to try to strengthen his relationship with voters.
abstract: Mitt Romney's campaign is working to narrow a perceived empathy gap between Romney and Pres Obama, who is seen by voters as more likable and easier to relate to.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney’s biggest challenge at the moment is not President Obama. It’s himself. He begins a four-state bus tour on Saturday to try to strengthen his relationship with voters.

headline.seo: Romney Renews Focus on Empathy Gap With Obama
headline.main: New Focus for Romney on Connecting and Closing the Empathy Gap
headline.print_headline: New Focus for Romney on Connecting and Closing the Empathy Gap
